title: Undergraduate Learning Assistant
responsibilities: Facilitate student comprehension of course material by explaining complex concepts clearly. Assist in reinforcing understanding through one-on-one guidance and group discussions. Provide feedback on assignments and exams to improve student performance.

title: Malmstrom Lab Student Research Assistant
responsibilities: Support ongoing research projects by conducting experiments, collecting and analyzing data, and maintaining accurate lab records.

title: Clerical Assistant
responsibilities: Design visually appealing flyers to communicate important information effectively. Maintain office organization by logging and processing mail, assisting in daily clerical tasks, and ensuring accurate documentation of correspondence.

title: Server

title: Stocker
responsibilities: Managed inventory for a high-volume, multi-billion-dollar retail operation by organizing merchandise, ensuring stock accuracy, and handling overstock. Built and arranged promotional displays to enhance product visibility, contributing to increased sales. Maintained a safe, organized work environment while delivering excellent customer service.

title: Line Cook
responsibilities: Prepared a variety of dishes while adhering to health and safety standards. Worked efficiently under pressure in a high-volume kitchen, coordinating with other kitchen staff to maintain timely service. Monitored inventory and ensured food quality and presentation.
